headline: Ecolab Declares Cash Dividend
summary: ST. PAUL, Minn., February 21, 2025--The board of directors of Ecolab Inc. today declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.65 per common share, to be paid April 15, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on March 18, 2025.
